abstract: Tommie Agee made two great catches in the 1969 World Series. Are there others that should be remembered?
snippet: Tommie Agee made two great catches in the 1969 World Series. Are there others that should be remembered?
lead_paragraph: Oh, geez, now I am in trouble with Met fans of a certain age. They are whacking away at me, in my reader email, for omitting Tommie Agee's two -- count 'em, two -- catches in the third game of the 1969 World Series. Just yesterday, that is to say.

headline.main: Add Agee's to List of Memorable Catches
